info.description: The Learning service enables applications to access Workday Learning data and functionality.
info.title: learning

tags.name: content
tags.description: Provides access to information about learning content.

tags.name: manageDigitalCourses
tags.description: Provides the ability to create and update digital courses. These REST APIs are secured to the Set Up for Learning Service domain.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of learning content.
get.description: Retrieves all learning content. Secured by: Learning Access, Manage: Learning Content, Manage: Learning Course Enrollments, Self-Service: Learning Instructor, Self-Service: On the Job Training, Set Up: Learning Catalog Scope: Learning Core

parameters.name: contentType
parameters.description: The type of learning content. The learning catalog comprises programs, blended and digital courses, course offerings for blended courses, and stand-alone lessons.

parameters.name: lastUpdated
parameters.description: When specified, only Learning Content updated since the specified datetime will be returned in the response.

parameters.name: lifecycleStatus
parameters.description: The current status of the learning content. Possible value is Active or Inactive.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

parameters.name: skills
parameters.description: The skills associated with this learning content.

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: The group of learning elements that this learning content belongs. Example: Compliance.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of lessons for a learning content.
get.description: Retrieves all lessons for a learning content. Secured by: Learning Access, Manage: Learning Content, Manage: Learning Course Enrollments, Self-Service: Learning Instructor, Self-Service: On the Job Training, Set Up: Learning Catalog Scope: Learning Core

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default is 20. The maximum is 100.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection. The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

post.summary: Provides the ability to create and update digital courses. These REST APIs are secured to the initiating actions of the BP.
post.description: Additional Information When updating courses, you must include all fields in your request, as the system removes the omitted fields from the courses. Example: If your course has 2 lessons and you only include 1 in the update, the omitted lesson will be removed. You can access the fields that are not available in the API using the user interface. API-supported fields are available in the schema. For subsequent updates after a POST request, our system will retain the manual changes done for the unsupported fields. Secured by: Manage Learning Course (REST Service) Scope: Learning Core

400.description:
Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
Error Code | Validation Message
--- | ---
A2677 | Content ID [contentID]: The Title [title] is already in use. Specify different content or update existing.
A2678 | Content ID [contentID]: The ID [contentID] is already in use. Specify different content or update existing.

get.summary: Retrieves a single learning content instance
get.description: Retrieves a learning content with the specified ID. Secured by: Learning Access, Manage: Learning Content, Manage: Learning Course Enrollments, Self-Service: Learning Instructor, Self-Service: On the Job Training, Set Up: Learning Catalog Scope: Learning Core

parameters.name: ID
parameters.description: The Workday ID of the resource.

200.description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched data.

get.summary: Retrieves a single lesson for a learning content instance
